duties_responsibilities.duty: Create and maintain comprehensive disaster recovery plans and collaborate with Enterprise Risk Management division.
Design, develop, maintain, and advance IT DR policies, plans, and procedures.
Coordinate DR exercises and ensure proper involvement from IT department colleagues.
Test and update disaster recovery plans to verify their effectiveness and accuracy.
Recommend DR solutions based on criticality of systems or data, stakeholder expectations, and technical capabilities.
Assist with DR incident response during actual IT situations and ensure alignment with industry regulations.
Collaborate with external vendors to evaluate disaster recovery services and solutions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Services, Engineering, or related field. (Preferred: Certified Business Continuity Professional, Member of the Business Continuity Institute, Certified Information Systems Security Professional, Certified Information Systems Auditor, Certified Disaster Recovery Engineer)
